OOC: BlackFortress is a dome _inside_ a volcano, metallic surface of 
this dome can stand  the lava, now the lava has a high levels. and 
the base is inside the main Volcano of Mont Etna, and this volcano 
has more of 100 mini volcanos... Let me check that datum.

IC:

Lava rivera emerged from the volcano, where the Predacon base was 
while the base was safely inside Mont Etna.
